description:
Swimsuits are the story of the hour as Yamada puts her looks to the ultimate test in a scandalous showdown with Kanejou. Next up, camping, toy weapons, and a moonlit photo shoot - clothing optional!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Grande Sfida in Costume da Bagno! Non Perderò Mai Contro di Te! - Giornate Estive da Ricordare... Yamada Ritorna Selvaggia!?
Major Duel in School Swimsuits! I`m Not Gonna Lose Against You! - Memories of a Summer Day... Yamada Returns to the Wild!
School-Mizu de Daikettou! Anta ni Dake wa Zettai Makenai! / Natsu no Hi no Omoide... Yamada, Yasei ni Kaeru!
スク水で大決闘! アンタにだけは絶対負けない! / 夏の日の思いで...山田, 野生に帰る!
